raw_comment: I notice that the closer to the equator you get leaves earlier you get leaves and on the Pacific ocean you they get leaves early. Mountain rages sperate when places get their leaves.
ace_sentences: I notice a pattern about leaves.
If a place is closer to the equator, then the place gets leaves earlier.
If a place is on the Pacific Ocean, then the place gets leaves earlier.
If a mountain range separates two places, then the places get their leaves at different times.
